data:
1. PREVENT-IA is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to educate workers comprehensively on occupational risk prevention to enhance workplace safety.
2. SafeLearn AI is an advanced education hub leveraging artificial intelligence to train employees in occupational risk prevention and safety protocols.
3. WorkSafe Genius uses cutting-edge AI technology to provide thorough training to workers on how to prevent occupational risks effectively.
4. OcuShield AI is a state-of-the-art educational tool powered by artificial intelligence, focused on teaching occupational risk prevention to improve worker safety.
5. ProTech Tutor is an AI-driven education system aimed at empowering employees with essential knowledge on occupational risk prevention.

Most consistent and relevant definition: 

PREVENT-IA is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to educate workers comprehensively on occupational risk prevention to enhance workplace safety.

Chosen Product Name:

PREVENT-IA
